sentence.Network_en: Acceptance of women preachers varies greatly from denomination to denomination.
sentence.Network_cn: 在接受女性传教士的问题上，不同教派的态度大相径庭。

sentence.Network_en: Avant-garde music to this day has not found general public acceptance.
sentence.Network_cn: 先锋音乐时至今日都没有得到大众的广泛认可。

sentence.Network_en: Even passive acceptance of the regime was a kind of collaboration.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使被动接受该政权也是一种通敌行为。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Old French, from accepter (see accept)

entry.def: Acceptance of an offer or a proposal is the act of saying yes to it or agreeing to it.

example.ex: The Party is being degraded by its acceptance of secret donations...
example.tran: 该党因私下接受捐赠而蒙羞。

example.ex: I sent them more than 6,000 cartoons before I had my one and only acceptance by them...
example.tran: 我寄给他们6,000多幅漫画，最后才有1幅得以采用。

entry.def: If there is acceptance of an idea, most people believe or agree that it is true.

example.ex: ...a theory that is steadily gaining acceptance...
There was a general acceptance that the defence budget would shrink.
example.tran: 人们普遍相信国防预算将会缩减。

entry.def: Your acceptance of a situation, especially an unpleasant or difficult one, is an attitude or feeling that you cannot change it and that you must get used to it.

example.ex: Popular acceptance of authority had been an early aim of the Nationalists.
example.tran: 国家主义者的一个早期目标是推动民众对权威的接受。

example.ex: ...his calm acceptance of whatever comes his way.
example.tran: 他遇事泰然处之的态度

entry.def: If there is acceptance of a new product, people start to like it and get used to it.

example.ex: Car manufacturers are already producing small numbers of electric vehicles to test customer acceptance...
example.tran: 汽车制造商们已经开始生产少量的电动车辆以测试顾客的接受程度。

example.ex: Avant-garde music to this day has not found general public acceptance.
example.tran: 先锋音乐时至今日都没有得到大众的广泛认可。

entry.def: Acceptance of someone into a group means beginning to think of them as part of the group and to act in a friendly way towards them.

example.ex: ...an effort to ensure that the disabled achieve real acceptance.
example.tran: 为确保残疾人真正得到接纳而作出的努力

means.word_mean: 1. the mental attitude that something is believable and should be accepted as true;

sentences.sentence: "acceptance of Newtonian mechanics was unquestioned for 200 years"

means.word_mean: 2. the act of accepting with approval; favorable reception;
3. the state of being acceptable and accepted;

sentences.sentence: "torn jeans received no acceptance at the country club"

means.word_mean: 4. (contract law) words signifying consent to the terms of an offer (thereby creating a contract)
5. banking: a time draft drawn on and accepted by a bank
6. a disposition to tolerate or accept people or situations;

sentences.sentence: "all people should practice toleration and live together in peace"

means.word_mean: 7. the act of taking something that is offered;

sentences.sentence: "her acceptance of the gift encouraged him"
"he anticipated their acceptance of his offer"

auth_sentence.res_content: There's something disquieting about his quest for acceptance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's something disquieting about his quest for acceptance.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
stems_affixes.word_buile: accept接受,承诺+ance物品,性质,状况→n.接受,承诺,容忍,赞同,相信
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
stems_affixes.word_buile: appear出现+ance物品,性质,状况→n.出现,露面;外表;[在会议等]作短暂露面
apply应用+ance物品,性质,状况→appliance用具,器具
assist援助,帮助+ance物品,性质,状况→n.协助,援助,补助
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
disturb扰乱,防碍+ance物品,性质,状况→n.动乱,骚乱,干扰
forbear忍受+ance物品,性质,状况→n.自制,忍耐
guide指导+ance物品,性质,状况→n.指导,领导
ignore不理,不顾,忽视+ance物品,性质,状况→ignorance无知,愚昧
persevere坚持+ance物品,性质,状况→n.坚持

stems_affixes.value_cn: 信任,信心,依靠,依靠的人或物
stems_affixes.word_buile: reli=rely依靠+ance物品,性质,状况→n.信任,信心,依靠,依靠的人或物
resemble[v.像,类似]+ance物品,性质,状况→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
venge惩罚+ance物品,性质,状况→n.报复,报仇,复仇
bal+ance物品,性质,状况→n.天平 n.&v.秤,平衡
allow允许+ance物品,性质,状况→宽容→津贴,补助

Sentence.sentence: The RA of two years added that while some conflicts "provided more multicultural acceptance and melding (融合)," there were also "jarring cultural confrontations.
Those who had watched Obama's acceptance speech as the Democrats' presidential candidate performed just as well, on average, as the white subjects.

sentences.en: We have the pleasure to ask your acceptance of our presents.
The new laws gained widespread acceptance.

jushi.english: Job-hopping, once a rare phenomenon, is gaining acceptance.
jushi.chinese: 跳槽一度甚为罕见,眼下却越来越普遍。

jushi.english: The proposal met with general acceptance.
jushi.chinese: 这项建议受到普遍欢迎。
